capability.name: Sub Custodian Agreement
capability.definition: This Service Domain establishes and maintains the terms governing sub custodian relationship
capability.role: Maintain sub custodian agreement terms and track and report on sub custodian activity. Note the lead custodian role may engage a sub custodian for handling international securities outside its jurisdiction
capability.example: The contractual terms are referenced during the settlement procedure for a securities trade where the sub custodian holds the associated documentation

key_features.name: Establish appropriate contractual terms with agency
key_features.description: Enables establish appropriate contractual terms with agency to support this service domain establishes and maintains the terms governing sub custodian relationship

key_features.name: Maintain and update contractual terms as necessary
key_features.description: Enables maintain and update contractual terms as necessary to support this service domain establishes and maintains the terms governing sub custodian relationship

key_features.name: Review proposed work/assignments for compliance with agreed terms
key_features.description: Enables review proposed work/assignments for compliance with agreed terms to support this service domain establishes and maintains the terms governing sub custodian relationship
